___budget.description: A dictionary mapping years to budgeted cost (USD)

___url.description: Link to a webpage containing additional information about this event.

items.description: Canonical case numbers for the proposals related to this event

___duration.description: Estimated duration of the event, in hours and minutes (h:mm)

___location.description: The coordinates of the proposal. If omitted, Cornerwise will geocode the primary address.

___first_hearing_date.description: The date and time of the first public hearing

___status.description: A descriptive label for the status of the project.

___case_number.description: A case number for this case, unique within the scope of this region.

___decision.description: Provides additional details about the decision from the reviewing body

___all_addresses.description: An array of all the addresses associated with this proposal. The first address is used as the primary address (e.g., for display purposes).

___source.description: A site where users can find additional information

___complete.description: The date that this proposal was closed, whether for approval or denial.

___region_name.description: If omitted, Cornerwise will use the region name configured for the importer.

___description.description: A detailed description of the case.

___updated_date.description: The last modification date and time

___parcel_id.description: An identifier for the corresponding parcel, unique within the scope of the region.
